item.title: AOL Will End Its Dial-Up Internet Service (Yes, It’s Still Operating)
item.description: The company said the service, synonymous with the early days of the internet, will be discontinued on Sept. 30.

item.description: The Israeli government said last week that it wanted to capture Gaza City, but how and when it will proceed has yet to be decided.
